room_title: Escape room "The Funeral Parlor" by The Key Haunted Escape Rooms in Indianapolis
review: We loved it. Never did an escape room before, so the Funeral Parlor was our first. We had an amazing time and the staff was very welcoming. We will be back to do another room!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Funeral Parlor" by The Key Haunted Escape Rooms in Indianapolis
review: Me and my friend took our daughters, age 10, 12 and 13 and played the Funeral Parlor. It was the perfect amount of creepy and funny. We had so much fun. We screamed, we laughed and we survived. It was perfect. We will definitely be back!
